Name: 艾斯菲尔的谎言
About the game: On a normal rainy night, I met a girl in the alley who claims herself come from another planet. But after knowing more about her, I begin to realize she seems actually to come from planet RM80. Game elements **AVG alternates with text dialogue mode to diversify the game experience; **High freedom of choice, clues and doubts are controlled by one hand; **Exquisite characterization, rich branch plot, everyone has his own secret; **The content of the script is 50000 words;
